classes.type: static static static static static static static static

classes.name: CI_Loader
dependencies: RuntimeException'The model name you are loading is the name of a resource that is already being used: '$name
RuntimeException$app_path"Model.php exists, but doesn't declare class CI_Model"
RuntimeException$app_path$class".php exists, but doesn't declare class "$class
RuntimeException'Unable to locate the model you have specified: '$model

classes.name: CI_DB_driver
dependencies: RuntimeException'Unable to connect to the database.'

classes.name: CI_Form_validation
dependencies: BadMethodCallException'Form_validation: set_rules() called without a $rules parameter'

classes.name: CI_Session_database_driver
dependencies: Exception'Query Builder not enabled for the configured database. Aborting.'
Exception'Configured database connection is persistent. Aborting.'
Exception'Configured database connection has cache enabled. Aborting.'

classes.name: CI_Session_files_driver
dependencies: Exception"Session: Configured save path '"$this->_config'save_path'"' is not a directory, doesn't exist or cannot be created."
Exception"Session: Configured save path '"$this->_config'save_path'"' is not writable by the PHP process."

classes.name: CI_Session
dependencies: UnexpectedValueException"Session: Configured driver '"$driver"' was not found. Aborting."

classes.name: CI_Xmlrpcs
dependencies:
XML_RPC_Response0
				$this->xmlrpcerrxml  xml_get_error_code$parser
				sprintf'XML error: %s at line %d'
				xml_error_stringxml_get_error_code$parser
				xml_get_current_line_number$parser
